title: Next to You
lyrics:
And I gotta say what's on my mind
I wanna love you all the time, time
Just wanna know what I could do
Just to be standing up right next to you
And I gotta say what's on my mind (say what's on my mind)

I wanna love you all the time, time

Just wanna know what I could do (know what I could do)

Just to be standing up right next to you, to you



And I gotta say what's on my mind (on my mind)

I wanna love you all the time, time

Just wanna know what I could do (know what I could do)

Just to be standing up right next to you



And I gotta say what's on my mind (say what's on my mind)

I wanna love you all the time, time

Just wanna know what I could do (know what I could do)

Just to be standing up right next to you, you



I gotta say what's on my mind

I gotta say what's

I gotta say what

I gotta say what's on my mind

I gotta say what's
